verses.hebrew: בְּרֵאשִׁית בָּרָא אֱלֹהִים אֵת הַשָּׁמַיִם וְאֵת הָאָרֶץ.
verses.hebrewPlain: בראשית ברא אלהים את השמים ואת הארץ
verses.translation: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
verses.license: Hebrew text public domain; translation JPS 1917

verses.translation: And the earth was waste and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep.
verses.license: Hebrew text public domain; translation JPS 1917

verses.hebrew: וַיֹּאמֶר אֱלֹהִים יְהִי אוֹר וַיְהִי אוֹר.
verses.hebrewPlain: ויאמר אלהים יהי אור ויהי אור
verses.translation: And God said: 'Let there be light.' And there was light.
verses.license: Hebrew text public domain; translation JPS 1917

verses.hebrew: וַיַּרְא אֱלֹהִים אֶת הָאוֹר כִּי טוֹב...
verses.hebrewPlain: וירא אלהים את האור כי טוב
verses.translation: And God saw the light, that it was good; and God divided the light from the darkness.
verses.license: Hebrew text public domain; translation JPS 1917

verses.translation: And God called the light Day, and the darkness He called Night.
verses.license: Hebrew text public domain; translation JPS 1917

license: Hebrew text public domain; translation JPS 1917
